website_summaries.verdict: Gourmet chocolate ice cream mix that impresses with its taste as well as time it saves to make.
pros: Crowd pleaser for its rich, creamy taste
Works with hand-crank or automatic ice cream machines
cons: Some found the texture to be a bit chalky

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: This mix is great. I used all half and half, the ice cream came out perfect. If you want a super firm ice cream follow the directions exactly on the box. I'm taking a star away because of cost. After using this mix I bought the ingredients. Hershey cocoa, powdered sugar, imitation vanilla, and made my own powdered mix for alot less. Then I added half and half and heavy cream for a firm texture. It tasted great. I like their product for convenience but it's too expensive for simple ingredients. They should lower their price to at least $9.99
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: So so. Same with market ice cream
customer_reviews.text: So, it is not cheap. 6 dollars/1 batch. So you need to pay for Heavy cream+ Half and half and milk and this. Only rrason I got this is I expected extra ordinary flavor but it was not. It is not premium gelato making kit, Just normal Breyers chocolate ice cream. Disapppointing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew it is hardly ice cream making mix - just low quality cocoa powder & sugar. So very expensive - for the slightest fraction of the cost I could have mixed sugar with much better quality cocoa powder. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Rich Chocolate Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have been making ice cream for years and this was the easiest I have ever made. I bypassed the creation of an egg-based custard base and went directly to the chocolate base itself. I'm a purist but I was persuaded to add chocolate chunks to the mix before hardening in the freezer. I also had to reduce the mix by half because of the size of my Lello ice cream maker's small freezing compartment of less than a quart. Great ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: Saltwaterfisherman

customer_reviews.title: A Little Pricey Once You Add Up Ingredients But Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this ice cream was amazing! I tried it with one of the lower-priced ice cream roll makers (that thing sucked) but ended up freezing this ice cream mix in a glass container. The flavor is great! By the time you add up the cost of the ingredients you purchase it's cheaper to buy ice cream from the store but without the added chemicals, etc. this was an excellent option! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ShakikiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flavor and texture
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic flavor and texture. Super easy to use. I use this as a base to make mocha almond ice cream. Just use 1/2 tsp instant coffee to our mixture and add toasted sliced almonds at the end. Will purchase again. I only wish you could buy in bulk to make this product cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Moore

customer_reviews.title: Yummalicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love the chocolate flavor! It's very rich and creamy and so smooth. The mix is, of course, easy to make. I love being able to have the fresh, fabulous home made ice cream in under an hour. This is my go to chocolate ice cream mix!
customer_reviews.author: mellanis

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, and absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.text: We received this order quickly. My four year old was able to help me make the ice cream mix. We chilled as directed, then used in our Cuisinart Ice Cream maker. Super easy, and absolutely delicious. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Good, quick ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: These mixes are very good. I generally use half and half in the recipes and store in a gelato bin and it works well. Flavors are very rich. While I love chocolate, I prefer the vanilla as the chocolate has some grainyness from the cocoa. These are a great option for quick ice cream at home.
customer_reviews.author: Q10

customer_reviews.title: Too chocolaty for me but my wife loved it.
customer_reviews.text: The taste and texture were very good but a little too chocolaty for my tast. It would have been about perfect to use one mix to make two catches. My wife loved it though, so different tastes.
customer_reviews.author: John & Sue Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like having chocolate ice cream that tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor I use this flavor in my homemade ice cream machine taste great at cookies cream nuts to it who knows how to beat in this ice cream maker
customer_reviews.author: marcells

customer_reviews.title: New to Ice Cream Making
customer_reviews.text: I have a new Breville Ice Cream maker and I found this product. I have all the flavors but Strawberry is my favorite..The one problem...Is it does not help my weight loss program... BUT the is great ice cream...
customer_reviews.author: Tim Barrett

customer_reviews.title: The best so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several brands and flavor, but this one is the best. I wish there were one with even less sugar so I can eat ice cream more often. It’s delicious!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yane

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and easy
customer_reviews.text: Very good ice cream mix. It seems pricey but when I started looking at ingredients to make from scratch, it was a good deal. Much easier too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Love icecream
customer_reviews.text: I always went to get icecream..no more I got a icemaker and this ice cream and all flavors and so easy and fun to make in my own
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream mix is very good. It tasted a bit like pudding to me. It is easy to make and I would buy it again. It wasn’t my favorite thing of all time, but it’s quick and quite tasty.
customer_reviews.author: K wells

customer_reviews.title: Not that great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our family was disappointed in this mix. It didn't taste very good and never wanted to freeze completely. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: James Southard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is so easy to make thank you. The flavor of it is so so good.
customer_reviews.author: DIANNA Allegretti

customer_reviews.title: Good product, tastes great
customer_reviews.text: The mix was awesome, no issues. Tasted very authentic like a it was purchased from the store.. Just wish it were either cheaper or came with more than 2 pkgs per box. Gets pricey after you buy the mix + cream, milk and half/half. Overall good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Foolish mortal

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the flavor and the preparation is super easy however the one downside to this product is that the texture is slightly chalky. that shouldn't keep you from buying this product though. Very good ice cream mix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. Received an ice cream machine for Christmas. Nice to find this online as it's hard to find in stores. Use this a lot, wish the larger size had a subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: craye

customer_reviews.title: very tasty and fun
customer_reviews.text: we got this so we could make homemade ice cream and it is very fun we also got a vanilla one and once they were fully turned into ice cream and we could eat it they both were do delicious and very rich i would defiantly recommend buying it for yourself or maybe even a gift
customer_reviews.author: N Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cream in 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, hope there are more flavors and want to figure out how to do from scratch
customer_reviews.author: kAY SCHUBERT

customer_reviews.title: Better than store-bought
customer_reviews.text: Good, strong chocolate flavor. I added some Jack Daniels Whiskey to one batch and it was habit-forming. Next time, I will try it with all half and half, leaving out the milk and heavy cream. Any way I have made this, it has been delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Milhous

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, the kids loved it! OK, so did I.. Came with coupon, so I ordered more...
customer_reviews.author: FMDirBoss

customer_reviews.title: Easy, but the best flavor
customer_reviews.text: I believe that all your ice creams are of the best quality. We sure enjoy more now that we can make it fresh at home
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ice cream for the old fashion machine, Used half and half and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Made this ice cream for July 4, 2018. My grandkids loved it. I found it not as creamy as most ice creams, but would use it for fast ice cream mixtures
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holiday Magic
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoy this product. They are making and selling ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Blake

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very chocolately, have tried other premixes, this is by far the best one out of them all. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jtwecky

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but to expensive
customer_reviews.text: Delicious but as expensive as Nancy Pelosis ice cream! I don’t get paid what she does.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Ice Cream Mix
customer_reviews.text: If you like Chocolate you will LOVE this...Perfect, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: VLR

customer_reviews.title: These taste great!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! The chocolate is a bit rich but hey that's not a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife and son really enjoyed this - I don't like chocolate ice cream :(.
customer_reviews.author: David Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use to homemade ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Used to making homemade and this wasn’t quite as good. Easier to mix up, but tasted closer to store bought ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ice cream mix
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to make good taste. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bruce judd

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is a bit pricey- but it makes delicious ice cream in my Cuisinart soft serve machine! Very creamy and great flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L Zellers

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious!!! Easy and useful for last minute when you gave guests.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Ice cream mix is hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Very creamy mix and doesn't freeze rock hard in your freezer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Worked in my ice cream maker better than any other types and it tasted great.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Delicious chocolate ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: We made a couple of batches of homemade ice cream - vanilla and chocolate. The vanilla was an old recipe we had and we used this mix for the chocolate. The chocolate was definitely a hit! It was easy to make a very tasty! Next time we'll make the vanilla from the mix also.
customer_reviews.author: cupcake

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST ICE CREAM MIX
customer_reviews.text: We have tried the others and this one is better, and is natural. Easy to make. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Triple Scoop Ice Cream Mix, Premium Chocolate, starter for use with home ice cream maker, non-gmo, no artificial colors or flavors, ready in under 30 mins, makes 2 qts (1 15oz box)
feature_bullets: TURN YOUR HOME INTO A GOURMET CREAMERY - Premium Chocolate ice cream starter with Guittard premium cocoa and Madagascar bourbon vanilla. For rich, creamy, chocolatey homemade ice cream.
MAKES FRESH, DELICIOUS ICE CREAM - Whisk together ice cream mix, half and half, whipping cream. Pour into your ice cream machine. In half an hour, you’re eating fresh, cold, soft ice cream - yum.
QUICK & EASY FAMILY FUN - No need to struggle with recipes, we’ve done the work for you. Try all our ice cream starter mix flavors for parties, snacks, desserts. Excellent for hot days.

NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED - With Triple Scoop, your family is eating fresh, real-food ingredients. No artificial flavors, colors, preservatives, trans fats, or corn syrup solids. No gums or emulsifiers.
MAKES TWO 1-QUART BATCHES - Each box makes two 1-quart batches. Works with any ice cream maker - automatic or hand-crank. Kid-approved.

specifications.Manufacturer: Atlast Supply Chain Consulting Group - Grocery
